DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure secretion accumulation within endotracheal tube mechanically ventilate patient test efficacy , safety clinical impact remove secretion use novel airway management catheter ( Complete Airway Management Catheters : CAM Rescue Cath CAM Endotrach Cath ) .
DOC.brief_title: Removal Endotracheal Tube Secretions Comprehensively Until Extubation
DOC.detailed_description: Thirty mechanically ventilate adult patient manage standard suction catheter . Just prior extubation , physiological parameter ( include work breathing ) record acoustic reflectometry use measure degree secretion accumulation within endotracheal tube . The endotracheal tube clean use CAM Catheters ( Rescue Cath follow Endotrach Cath ) physiological parameter endotracheal tube reflectometry measurement repeat comparative analysis .
DOC.criteria: Patients receive medical care adult intensive care unit set Patients intubate mechanically ventilate least 12 hour Patients intubated endotracheal tube internal diameter 7.0 mm great Patients receive medical care set compatible adult intensive care unit Patients intubate mechanically ventilate less 12 hour Patients intubated endotracheal tube internal diameter 6.5 mm less Patients intubate dual lumen steelreinforced endotracheal tube
